name: barrenground-coffee
description: Barren Ground Coffee ordering system with customer frontend and employee dashboard

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:customer" "npm run dev:employee" --names "backend,customer,employee" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../customer-frontend && npm install && cd ../employee-dashboard && npm install
scripts.build: echo 'This is a monorepo. Deploy individual projects: backend, customer-frontend, or employee-dashboard'
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../customer-frontend && npm run build && cd ../employee-dashboard && npm run build
